name: JumpJump (FiliziDev)
description:
JumpJump is a small jump and run game, you have a pistol in your hand that shoots ropes and it can hold many objects. You have to master the stages and levels.

Known Bugs: Windows Smartscreen comes because we are not a verified publisher; Transparent stairs from below;

What should come in the next updates:

Point in the middle of the screen to enhance the gaming experience; More levels; More stages;

Controls: 

R - Reset Game

Escape - Exit Game

Disclaimer:

This game is in a very early stage of development
